title: Fresh Mozzarella - BelGioioso Cheese
text: Made from fresh, local milk gathered only a few hours after milking, BelGioioso Fresh Mozzarella begins with quality ingredients and care. The result is a delicate, clean-flavored Fresh Mozzarella with a soft, porcelain white appearance â€“ the finest available on the market today. Learn how to say Fresh Mozzarella Pair with tomatoes, fresh basil, roasted peppers, herbs, cured meats, melon, grapes and light wine. Water-pack cups: Cultured pasteurized milk, salt, lactic acid, enzymes. Thermoform packs: Pasteurized milk, vinegar, enzymes, salt. 2025, 2023, 2006 - American Cheese Society (3rd Place) 2024, 2022 - World Championship Cheese Contest (3rd Place) 2024, 2023, 2012, 2011, 2005, 2003 - American Cheese Society (2nd Place) 2023, 2017, 2011 - U.S. Championship Cheese Contest (2nd Place) 2020 - World Championship Cheese Contest (2nd Place) 2019, 2007 - U.S. Championship Cheese Contest (1st Place) Best of Class 2024, 2016, 2014, 2011, 2002, 1994 - American Cheese Society (1st Place) Best of Class 2015, 2012 - Wisconsin State Fair Cheese & Butter Contest (2nd Place) 2012 - Wisconsin State Fair Cheese & Butter Contest (3rd Place) 2010 - World Cheese Awards (3rd Place) Bronze Award
